doc:
James Patterson (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Patterson_(actor) 0 James Patterson (June 29, 1932 – August 19, 1972) was an American Tony Award-winning actor for his role in the 1968 Harold Pinter play, The Birthday Party. His best-known film role was in Lilith (1964), and he had numerous guest appearances on television through the early 1970s. He was also well known for his appearance as Jeffrey Butler in the cult classic horror film Silent Night, Bloody Night. Patterson died of cancer at age 40 in 1972 in New York City. James_Patterson ( June_29_,_1932 – August_19_,_1972 ) was an_American_Tony_Award-winning_actor for his_role in the_1968_Harold_Pinter play , The_Birthday_Party . His_best-known_film_role was in Lilith_(_1964_) , and he had numerous_guest_appearances on television through the_early_1970s . He was_also_well_known for his_appearance as Jeffrey_Butler in the_cult_classic_horror_film_Silent_Night , Bloody_Night . Patterson died of cancer at age_40 in 1972 in New_York_City .
